---
title: "3D Trajectory Barrier Intersection Check in R"
author: "Andre Kotze"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(sf)
library(microbenchmark)

# define checking function
"validate" <- function(line, zones) {
  if (st_intersects(line, zones)) {
    print('error')
  }
}

# read data
data = read.csv()
lines = c()
zones = c()
```

# Results

```{r}
# boolean results from st_intersects()
for (line in lines) {
  validate(line, zones)
}
```


```{r}
# benchmark
res = microbenchmark(validate(test_line, test_zones))
print(res)
```
